quote.text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quote.author: Maya Angelou

scripture.text: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️

I don’t know if you felt it,I dont know if your day was good or bad but I am sure your energy today was so contagious. I am sure You lit up everything around you. I hope this small page gives you back even a little of that shine you share with others. You're appreciated more than words can say. And just so you know, you made today a little better... just by being you 💐
